snippet: On the battlefield, individuals with language skills are rare and highly prized. Once their job is done, however, they do not always receive much protection from the militaries they serve.
abstract: On the battlefield, individuals with language skills are rare and highly prized. Once their job is done, however, they do not always receive much protection from the militaries they serve.

headline.main: Interpreters' Accomplishments Fail to Translate Into Visas
